content: gongbetter terminal-based workflow working jira, git githubview github gongsummarygong is cli make working an issue tracker ( at supported clients) still keeping flow going the terminal. can easily start branches off issues, comment also link commits the issue url.usageinstallationhead to github releases. latest releases have executables osx linux. did test gong windows if want build windows test, please let know.once download latest release, put in path you now usegongcurrently supported clients * jira you like contribute different client, please feel free submit prlogin order use gong first need login.gong login {client-name}each the supported clients prompt required fields order login the system. jira need username, pass a couple more while others might need api token.once input of details client attempt login. succeeded will let know.start working an issuegong start {issue-id} --type feature you to start working an issue, can type gong start the issue id what type work is (defaults feature). will a couple things 1. create branch name {type}/{issue-id}-{issue-title-sluggified} 2. transition issue a started stategong browsewhile working a branch matches gong regular expression ( above), can type gong browse it open a browser opened the issue automatically.gong commentwhile working a branch matches gong regular expression, can type echo "comment" | gong comment it send comment the ticket.why pipe? reason choosing pipe not have comment an argument is have ability send output the comment. i find useful is send diffs, files, buffers vim more. this approach, find write much better comments tickets. will the same :)](https://asciinema.org//d0rcjavbv55lbq1xpsrqiyyu6)gong prepare-commit-message is meant be used directly, instead is meant be wrapped simple wrapper git hooks.sample hooks be found git-hooks directory. you need do is copy into .git/hooks directory. will add link the issue every commit. whether do git commit "commit message" edit commit message using editor git commit`install commit hooks your repositorycurl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kensodev/gong/develop/git-hooks/prepare-commit-msg > .git/hooks/prepare-commit-messagechmod +x .git/hooks/prepare-commit-messagecurl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kensodev/gong/develop/git-hooks/commit-msg > .git/hooks/commit-messagechmod +x .git/hooks/commit-messageissues/feedback you any issues, please open here github hit up twitter @kensodevupcoming featuresgong slacksend message a slack channel, tagging issue are working gong createcreate ticket, automatically giving an id starting work the issue.gong next/pickshow the next items your backlog, able start without opening browsergong is maintained kensodev page was generated github pages.
